large.description: Find mocha tests that have too many lines of code
examples:
$ btf large --dir=/some/test/dir --lines=50 --top=20
# outputs the 20 largest tests from the given directory that have at least 50 lines

dir.name: dir
dir.description: the directory containing tests to search

lines.name: lines
lines.description: number of lines of test code that is too many
